## About Me

Full Stack Software Engineer in NYC. Florida State grad.

Passionate about golfer and playing electric guitar.

Mild obsession with personal investing and finance.

## Social Media

Fellow #fintwit folks can follow me on [twitter](https://www.twitter.com/computerbin "Ben's Twitter Account")

## Resources

* [Understanding Options](https://www.amazon.com/Understanding-Options-2E-Paperback-Common/dp/B00HR72VQA/ "Understanding Options by Michael Sincere") (great read)

#### ** Disclaimer

_I am not a financial advisor. The opinions expressed in this Blog are for general informational purposes only and are not intended to provide specific advice or recommendations for any individual or on any specific security or investment product._
